title: Glassman: Some sectors of the economy haven't recovered
itunes:title: Glassman: Some sectors of the economy haven't recovered
description:
JPMorgan's James Glassman sits down to discuss the quality of the job market on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.
